name: Spider Mommy: 8 Feet Under
description:
WARNING:  contains drawings of spiders and adult language!

This game was developed during a 5-Day-Game-Jam with the Theme "A Game for Your Mother".

 "A Spider-Mommy is ruling her underground Spider-Kingdom with questionable methods. All her countless offsprings fight for her love. But only one can be her favorite darling...

A narrative driven experience with a twist!

MADE BY

Emilia: Programming and Implementation, Game Design, Animation, Production, VFX

Vlad: Narrative Design, Voice Acting, Sound Design

Julia: UI / UX Design, Game Design, Animation

Jenny: Concept Art, Game Art, Branding / Logo Design

Any: Game Art
